#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
        int t;
        cin >>t;
        int n ,i, st[100];
        while (t--)
        {
                cin >> n;
                for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
                {
                        cin >> st[i];
                }
                int count = 0;
                for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++)
                {
                        count = count + st[i] / (i+1);

                }
                if ( count % 2 == 0 )
                        cout << "BOB" << endl;
                else
                        cout << "ALICE" << endl;

        }

        return 0;
}
